entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
